channel.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
channel.description:
I know this is Black Mesa forum, but whatever.
Okay.. When I'm trying to download a map from another server, it just keep downloading (and there isnt even appearing bars.)
And, when I'm trying to make my own game, it says "not responding" just before it should be downloaded and ready. I kept it there about 45min and nothing happened.
Please respond. Thnx.

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: ShakerSilver
item.description:
Try verifying your game cache. You might be missing some files.

If that doesn’t work, then try reinstalling the game. (save your addons first)

And if that doesn’t work then… ¯(°_o)/¯

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: Heke_v
item.description:
I have gmod 10.

I havent tried to download the map from direct url, because I dont want to download every map, that I play, from direct url.

I made an account here, because I cant wait for BMS release and I want to see the news of it.

I think you can understand me even though Im from Finland.

I have tried these tricks:

console: sv_lan 0 and 1

delete my cache -file

And other that I cant remember.

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: Sklar
item.description:
^

Or if the server is using a toybox map then make sure the map is in this directory;

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\[USERNAME]\garrysmod\garrysmod\addons\toybox\maps

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: ShakerSilver
item.description:
Have you tried downloading the maps off the internet then directly adding them to the game?

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
He registered here two days ago, because he knew that today he was going to ask a question about gmod.

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod wont download maps
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
This is your first post? You registered here to ask a question about Garry’s Mod rather than Facepunch? :rolleyes:

Well, is it GMod 9 or GMod 10? I don’t actually know the answer for either, but it’s still an important piece of information.

Read full topic
